akn:section.akn:heading: Property distributable in the course of a demutualization, rehabilitation, or related reorganization of an insurance company.

akn:content.akn:p: Property distributable in the course of demutualization, rehabilitation or related reorganization of an insurance company, shall be deemed abandoned 2 years after the date of the demutalization if, at the time of the demutualization:

Property distributable in the course of a demutualization, rehabilitation, or related reorganization of a mutual insurance company that is not subject to subsection (a) of this section shall be reportable as otherwise provided by this chapter.
